info.title: sys-con 1.x (2024)
info.author: o0Zz
info.details:
Connect any USB controller to your Nintendo Switch.

Sys-con v1.x is a Nintendo Switch module that adds support for all HID and XID joysticks and gamepads to the Nintendo Switch.

Support all USB controllers: PC controllers, Wheels, Dualshock 3, Dualshock 4, Dualsense (PS5), XBOX, XBOX360, XBOXONE, ...

changelog:
v1.6.1
Changelog
- Fixed an issue where sys-con failed to start when log.txt is missing (88)

v1.6.0
Changelog
- Added support for Firmware v21.0.0- (86)
- Fixed controller freeze due to thread priority too high (72)
- Add support for the L-TEK Dance Pad PRO (DDR pad) (75) (@Phantop)

- Added support for Brake and Accelerator (85)

1.5.4

1.5.3
